message.content:
cs.CV, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.MM 

The paper addresses the task of matching image content with natural language descriptions, which is a problem in both computer vision (cs.CV) and natural language processing (cs.CL). The proposed method is based on convolutional neural networks (cs.LG) and character-based textual embeddings (cs.IR). Finally, the paper evaluates its approach on a well-known image-text alignment dataset (cs.MM).
